synthetic_protocols.name: Basic Translation Protocol
synthetic_protocols.description: A simple protocol for translating basic phrases between two languages.

steps.details: Split the input text into individual words.
Translate each token from English to Spanish.
Reconstruct the translated tokens into a coherent sentence.

synthetic_protocols.name: Contextual Translation Protocol
synthetic_protocols.description: A protocol that considers context for translating phrases.

steps.details: Analyze the context of the input phrase.
Split the input text into individual words.
Translate each token considering the context.
Reconstruct the translated tokens into a coherent sentence.

synthetic_protocols.name: Technical Document Translation Protocol
synthetic_protocols.description: A protocol designed for translating technical documents with precision.

steps.details: Extract technical terms from the document.
Split the input text into individual words.
Translate each token while preserving technical terminology.
Review the translation for accuracy and consistency.
Reconstruct the translated tokens into a coherent document.

example.input: 量子计算是未来的技术。
example.output: Quantum computing is the technology of the future.
